```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# Import data

```{r data}
# samples collection
samples <- read_csv(here("output", "clean_data", "01_sample-collection_clean-data.csv"))
```


# Exploratotry analysis

```{r exp analysis}
# 2016-2017: soil samples
# 2018: plants
samples %>%
  group_by(year) %>% 
  count() 

samples$county %>% 
  n_distinct() # 47 counties sampled 
```
